last_episode_to_air.name: My Kinda People and the Big To-Do
last_episode_to_air.overview: Bonnie gains a new outlook on her sobriety after dealing with difficult news. Also, Jill and Andy take a big step in their relationship.

name: Mom
overview: Aan irreverent and outrageous take on true family love‚Äêand dysfunction. Newly sober single mom Christy struggles to raise two children in a world full of temptations and pitfalls. Testing her sobriety is her formerly estranged mother, now back in Christy's life and eager to share passive-aggressive insights into her daughter's many mistakes.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Newly sober single mom Christy is challenged when her estranged, overly critical mother returns to her life in the series premiere of this comedy from executive producer Chuck Lorre.

episodes.name: A Pee Stick and an Asian Raccoon
episodes.overview: Christy and Bonnie set aside their differences to deal with a family crisis together.

episodes.name: A Small Nervous Meltdown and a Misplaced Fork
episodes.overview: Christy goes on her first date since she stopped drinking. Meanwhile, Bonnie teaches her grandson Roscoe to gamble.

episodes.name: Loathing and Tube Socks
episodes.overview: Christy‚Äôs patience is tested by everyone she knows. Meanwhile, Bonnie runs into an old rival.

episodes.name: Six Thousand Bootleg T-Shirts and a Prada Handbag
episodes.overview: Christy makes a new friend who has big problems. Meanwhile, Bonnie attempts to put someone else's needs ahead of her own.

episodes.name: Abstinence and Pudding
episodes.overview: Christy is determined to take things slow in her relationship with Adam. Meanwhile, Bonnie and her rival from AA, Marjorie, disagree on what "taking it slow" means.

episodes.name: Estrogen and a Hearty Breakfast
episodes.overview: Christy squares off against Luke's conservative parents, who are upset about Violet's pregnancy. Meanwhile, Bonnie is determined not to let menopause get the best of her.

episodes.name: Big Sur and Strawberry Lube
episodes.overview: Christy is nervous about going on a romantic weekend getaway with Adam. Meanwhile, Gabriel's wife suspects he is cheating and seeks comfort from Christy.

episodes.name: Zombies and Cobb Salad
episodes.overview: Bonnie struggles to keep her life together when she loses her job; Christy tries to help Bonnie get back on track.

episodes.name: Belgian Waffles and Bathroom Privileges
episodes.overview: Christy has trouble accepting how much easier life is with Bonnie in the house.  Meanwhile, Baxter sets up camp in the driveway.

episodes.name: Cotton Candy and Blended Fish
episodes.overview: When Christy and Bonnie find out that Marjorie has cancer, they attempt to make their best to support her, while they try to apply her strength and patience their own lives.

episodes.name: Corned Beef and Handcuffs
episodes.overview: When Bonnie starts dating chef Rudy, Christy winds up stuck in the middle.

episodes.name: Hot Soup and Shingles
episodes.overview: Despite an injury, Christy refuses to admit that she needs Bonnie's help; Luke asks Baxter for advice about fatherhood.

episodes.name: Leather Cribs and Medieval Rack
episodes.overview: Christy and Bonnie come clean about the secrets they've been keeping from each other. Meanwhile, Violet and Luke discover they have different ideas about parenting.

episodes.name: Fireballs and Bullet Holes
episodes.overview: Christy tries to start a relationship with her father, Alvin, while Bonnie struggles to accept the fact that Christy wants him in her life.

episodes.name: Nietzsche and a Beer Run
episodes.overview: Christy is tempted by her old vices when she dates an attractive, hard-partying man named David. Bonnie decides her advice is worth money and becomes a life coach.

episodes.name: Jail Jail and Japanese Porn
episodes.overview: Bonnie must pick up the slack when Christy puts her new relationship with David ahead of family and friends.

episodes.name: Sonograms and Tube Tops
episodes.overview: When Violet feels nervous about becoming a mom, Christy plans a baby shower for her; Bonnie lands a new client.

episodes.name: Toilet Wine and the Earl of Sandwich
episodes.overview: Bonnie and Christy help Regina tie up loose ends before she goes to prison; Alvin gets acquainted with his grandchildren.

episodes.name: Clumsy Monkeys and a Tilted Uterus
episodes.overview: Christy and Bonnie try to make sure everything goes smoothly when Violet finds the perfect couple to adopt her baby.

episodes.name: Broken Dreams and Blocked Arteries
episodes.overview: Tensions are raised between Alvin and Bonnie, leaving Christy caught in the middle; Violet is worried about going to prom.

episodes.name: Smokey Taylor and a Deathbed Confession
episodes.overview: Bonnie and Christy help Violet as she goes through labor; Christy thinks Bonnie still has feelings for Alvin.

episodes.name: Hepatitis and Lemon Zest
episodes.overview: Bonnie is furious when Christy's poor financial decisions threaten the family's living situation. Meanwhile, Christy agrees to help out Jill, a woman who is newly sober.

episodes.name: Figgy Pudding and the Rapture
episodes.overview: Christy convinces herself that everything is fine even though her family is basically homeless. Surprisingly, Bonnie is the one who tries to bring her back to reality.

episodes.name: Chicken Nuggets and a Triple Homicide
episodes.overview: In order to get the family back together, Christy and Bonnie rent a house with a colorful past. Meanwhile, Bonnie tries to broker a peace between Christy and Alvin.

episodes.name: Forged Resumes and the Recommended Dosage
episodes.overview: While Christy tries to get to the bottom of Violet's erratic behavior, Bonnie attempts to get a job.

episodes.name: Kimchi and a Monkey Playing Harmonica
episodes.overview: Christy has mixed feelings about Candace and Baxter's relationship and things heat up between Alvin and Bonnie.

episodes.name: Crazy Eyes and a Wet Brad Pitt
episodes.overview: Christy and Bonnie are in the lap of luxury when Christy's wealthy sponsee, Jill, asks them to keep her company on her first night out of rehab.

episodes.name: Soapy Eyes and a Clean Slate
episodes.overview: Christy tries to make amends for her past deeds. Bonnie takes a cue from her and decides to make up for treating Alvin so poorly through the years.

episodes.name: Free Therapy and a Dead Lady's Yard Sale
episodes.overview: Family secrets surface when Christy and Bonnie join Violet's therapy session.

episodes.name: Godzilla and a Sprig of Mint
episodes.overview: Christy's evening alone takes an unexpected turn when she meets her attractive, single neighbor, Andy. Bonnie and Alvin's romantic plans are derailed by Alvin's ex-wife, Lorraine.

episodes.name: Nudes and a Six-Day Cleanse
episodes.overview: Realizing she has been a waitress longer than she intended, Christy moves toward a career change; Bonnie and Alvin try to revisit their youth.

episodes.name: Three Smiles and an Unpainted Ceiling
episodes.overview: An unexpected death rocks the Plunkett household.

episodes.name: Kitty Litter and a Class A Felony
episodes.overview: Christy does damage control when Bonnie acts out after the death of a loved one.

episodes.name: Cheeseburger Salad and Jazz
episodes.overview: Concerned about the way Bonnie is handling Alvin's death, Christy tries to get her mother professional help.

episodes.name: Benito Poppins and a Warm Pumpkin
episodes.overview: When Christy gets promoted to manager of the restaurant, she discovers that being the boss comes with its own set of problems. Also, Bonnie has a nemesis in the building who wants her fired.

episodes.name: Turkey Meatballs and a Getaway Car
episodes.overview: Christy makes a discovery about what excites her; Bonnie takes her new role as secretary a little too seriously.

episodes.name: Dirty Money and a Woman Named Mike
episodes.overview: Christy and Bonnie are shocked when they discover how prison has changed their friend Regina.

episodes.name: A Commemorative Coin and a Misshapen Head
episodes.overview: Christy and Bonnie worry when they find out that Violet's new boyfriend is old enough to be her father.

episodes.name: Dropped Soap and a Big Guy on a Throne
episodes.overview: Christy brings Bonnie to a handsome doctor after she injures her back.

episodes.name: Mashed Potatoes and a Little Nitrous
episodes.overview: Bonnie goes to extremes to keep a major secret from Christy.

episodes.name: Sick Popes and a Red Ferrari
episodes.overview: After Bonnie‚Äôs relapse, the women from her meeting rally around to help her through withdrawal from painkillers, but Christy wants no part of it.

episodes.name: Patient Zero and the Chocolate Fountain
episodes.overview: Christy and Bonnie prove to be unwelcome guests wherever they go due to their testy relationship.

episodes.name: Fun Girl Stuff and Eternal Salvation
episodes.overview: Christy blames Bonnie when Roscoe announces he wants to go live with his father, on the second season finale.

episodes.name: Terrorists and Gingerbread
episodes.overview: Bonnie's estranged biological mother arrives, prompting Bonnie and Christy to clash over the notion of forgiveness.

episodes.name: Thigh Gap and a Rack of Lamb
episodes.overview: Christy and Bonnie try to help Jodi, a teenage addict they met at their meeting.

episodes.name: Mozzarella Sticks and a Gay Piano Bar
episodes.overview: After Christy and Bonnie get Jodi, a recovering drug addict, back on her feet, they find themselves addicted to the rush of helping others and take on a new ‚Äúproject,‚Äù Michelle.

episodes.name: Sawdust and Brisket
episodes.overview: Christy is thrilled when Violet tells her she wants to spend more time together and improve their relationship. Also, Bonnie tries to make amends with her nemesis in the building, Beverly.

episodes.name: A Pirate, Three Frogs and a Prince
episodes.overview: Christy feels threatened by Baxter's girlfriend in the wake of Roscoe's parent-teacher conference.  Bonnie flirts with an unlikely target.

episodes.name: Horny-Goggles and a Catered Intervention
episodes.overview: Regina doesn't think she's an alcoholic and Wendy encourages the ladies to attand a sober holiday dance.

episodes.name: Kreplach and a Tiny Tush
episodes.overview: Christy hosts a dinner attended by Violet's future mother-in-law, who is hard to please. Steve wants to take his relationship with Bonnie to the next level.

episodes.name: Snickerdoodle and a Nip Slip
episodes.overview: When Christy catches the eye of Candace's wealthy, charming father Fred, Candace and Baxter are outraged while Bonnie pushes Christy to give him a chance.

episodes.name: My Little Pony and a Demerol Drip
episodes.overview: Christy's burgeoning relationship with Fred gets more and more difficult for Candace to handle.  However, Bonnie enjoys the perks of Chrsty dating a wealthy man.

episodes.name: Quaaludes and Crackerjack
episodes.overview: In order to avoid her ex-boyfriend, Bonnie drags Christy to a new AA meeting, only to run into her ex-girlfriend, Jeanine, from 30 years ago.

episodes.name: Cinderella and a Drunk MacGyver
episodes.overview: Christy tries to help Julian (Joe Manganiello), a handsome, newly sober AA member, but her attraction to him complicates things.  Meanwhile, Bonnie jumps at the chance to attend a lavish charity gala with Jill.

episodes.name: Diabetic Lesbians and a Blushing Bride
episodes.overview: After Marjorie reveals her plans to get married, Christy and Bonnie want to make sure she has a really special day.

episodes.name: Sticky Hands and a Walk on the Wild Side
episodes.overview: Christy, Jill and Wendy find themselves in a sticky situation when they agree to help Bonnie smuggle an illegal substance across the Canadian border.

episodes.name: Death, Death, Death and a Bucket of Chicken
episodes.overview: Christy tries to be supportive when a health scare throws Bonnie into a tailspin.

episodes.name: Nazi Zombies and a Two-Hundred Pound Baby
episodes.overview: Bonnie tries to get Christy to admit that she still has feelings for her ex-husband, Baxter.

episodes.name: Cornflakes and the Hair of Three Men
episodes.overview: When the restaurant closes for renovations, Christy takes a job as Jill's personal assistant. Also, Bonnie answers a wrong number and falls for the guy on the other end of the line, Adam.

episodes.name: Caperberries and a Glass Eye
episodes.overview: Christy encourages Bonnie to go out with a great new guy, Adam, only to find out he's not as great as she thought.

episodes.name: Beast Mode and Old People Kissing
episodes.overview: When Jodi's boyfriend, Travis (Jesse Luken), who was with her when she overdosed, shows up at an A.A. meeting, Christy struggles to show him the compassion he needs. Also, Bonnie's new boyfriend, Adam (William Fichtner), feels left out because she spends so much time at A.A.

episodes.name: A Catheter and a Dipsy-Doodle
episodes.overview: Despite being extremely ill, Christy insists on taking her final exams. Also, Bonnie is furious when she suspects her boyfriend, Adam, is cheating on her.

episodes.name: Pure Evil and a Free Piece of Cheesecake
episodes.overview: When Christy learns she made the Dean's List at school, she is disappointed by Bonnie's lackluster response.

episodes.name: Mahjong Sally and the Ecstasy
episodes.overview: Christy and Bonnie don‚Äôt know who to believe when they hear conflicting stories about Violet and Gregory‚Äôs break-up,

episodes.name: Atticus Finch and the Downtrodden
episodes.overview: Christy's dream of becoming a lawyer is in jeopardy when she is hit with the reality of how much her education will cost. Also, Bonnie becomes the disciplinarion with Violet back at home.

episodes.name: High-tops And Brown Jacket
episodes.overview: In the fourth season opener, Bonnie and Adam's relationship is tested when he moves in with her and Christy for a few weeks. Also, Christy learns the hard way that it may be a mistake to try and meet men with Jill.

episodes.name: Sword Fights and a Dominican Shortstop
episodes.overview: Christy considers giving up her dream of becoming a lawyer when Bonnie's ex-girlfriend, Jeanine, offers her a lucrative job in real estate. Also, Adam is very curious about Bonnie's past with women.

episodes.name: Sparkling Water and Ba-Dinkers
episodes.overview: Bonnie fears she's become undesirable when she catches Adam smoking pot before sex, and Christy tries to smooth things over between them.

episodes.name: Curious George and the Big Red Nightmare
episodes.overview: Christy and Bonnie worry that Roscoe has a drug problem when Baxter and Candace catch him smoking pot.

episodes.name: Blow and a Free Mcmuffin
episodes.overview: Christy and Bonnie rush to a sick Violet‚Äôs side, only to find out that having mono is the least of her worries.

episodes.name: Xanax and a Baby Duck
episodes.overview: Christy becomes overprotective and keeps a constant eye on 12-year-old son Roscoe after discovering he's been using drugs and alcohol.

episodes.name: Cornbread and a Cashmere Onesie
episodes.overview: Christy and Bonnie worry about Jill after her cry for help on the anniversary of her mother's suicide.

episodes.name: Freckled Bananas and a Little Schwinn
episodes.overview: Christy and Bonnie dip back into illegal activities, and Adam questions their morality.

episodes.name: Bad Hand and British Royalty
episodes.overview: Christy and Bonnie have their hands full when Adam‚Äôs hard-partying friends come for a visit.

episodes.name: A Safe Word and a Rib Eye
episodes.overview: Christy feels left out when Bonnie and the ladies keep Jill‚Äôs pregnancy a secret.

episodes.name: Good Karma and the Big Weird
episodes.overview: Bonnie encourages Christy to pursue Marjorie's charming nephew, Nick, despite the fact that he's been declared off limits.

episodes.name: Wind Chimes and a Bottomless Pit of Sadness
episodes.overview: Christy, Bonnie, Jill and Wendy accidentally eat pot-filled cookies.

episodes.name: A Bouncy Castle and an Aneurysm
episodes.overview: Christy is worried Bonnie is jeopardizing her relationship with Adam when Bonnie connects with a handsome stranger.

episodes.name: Roast Chicken and a Funny Story
episodes.overview: A heartbroken Bonnie drives everyone crazy, so Christy begs Adam to take Bonnie back.

episodes.name: Night Swimmin' and an English Muffin
episodes.overview: When Bonnie discovers Adam is still close with his ex-wife, Danielle, Christy worries the emotional fallout could jeopardize Bonnie‚Äôs sobriety.

episodes.name: Martinis and a Sponge Bath
episodes.overview: When Christy and Adam get into a car accident, Bonnie is hurt to discover she is neither of their emergency contacts.

episodes.name: Black Mold and an Old Hot Dog
episodes.overview: Christy helps Jill adjust to being a new foster mother, and Bonnie has trouble convincing tenants that she‚Äôs a good building manager.

episodes.name: Tush Push and Some Radishes
episodes.overview: Following the death of Bonnie‚Äôs mother, Christy and Bonnie learn that she kept a very big secret.

episodes.name: Tantric Sex and the Sprouted Flute
episodes.overview: Christy annoys everyone when she adopts her new boyfriend Brad‚Äôs healthy lifestyle, and Bonnie and Adam decide to take the next step in their relationship.

episodes.name: A Cricket and a Hedge Made of Gold
episodes.overview: When Marjorie takes a break from the group, Bonnie becomes the go-to for everyone's problems and Christy tries to overcome a painful memory from her past.

episodes.name: A Few Thongs and a Hawaii Funeral
episodes.overview: Christy and Jill take Emily to see her biological mother, Natasha, in rehab where they make a surprising discovery, and Bonnie watches Adam‚Äôs dog while he‚Äôs out of town.

episodes.name: Lockjaw and a Liquid Diet
episodes.overview: In the season finale, Christy tries to help when Bonnie gets into trouble with the IRS but, realizing she‚Äôs in over her head, she encourages Bonnie to seek help from her newfound brother, Ray.

episodes.name: Twinkle Lights and Grandma Shoes
episodes.overview: Bonnie gets cold feet when considering her future with Adam; Christy risks failing a test to help a fellow alcoholic.

episodes.name: Fish Town and Too Many Thank You's
episodes.overview: Bonnie is suspicious when her brother returns from rehab and befriends Adam; Christy and Bonnie have a brush with the law when they take Ray's fancy car for a joy ride.

episodes.name: A Seafaring Ancestor and a Bloomin' Onion
episodes.overview: Christy discovers she and her younger classmate make a good team, both in and out of the classroom; Bonnie steps up when a newly sober Natasha fears she can't handle motherhood.

episodes.name: Fancy Crackers and Giant Women
episodes.overview: Bonnie suffers withdrawal after giving up cable TV to help Christy; the women rally around Jill after she has a breakdown in her favorite department store.

episodes.name: Poodle Fuzz and a Twinge of Jealousy
episodes.overview: An injury temporarily puts Bonnie in a wheelchair; Christy takes over as building manager and makes a surprising discovery.

episodes.name: Smooth Jazz and a Weird Floaty Eye
episodes.overview: Bonnie insists on meeting Adam's estranged brother, Patrick; things get weird when Patrick takes a romantic interest in Christy.

episodes.name: Too Many Hippies and Huevos Rancheros
episodes.overview: Christy and Bonnie rally around Marjorie when her husband has a stroke

episodes.name: An Epi-pen and a Security Cat
episodes.overview: After their home is robbed at Christmastime, Christy and Bonnie‚Äôs hunt for the thief leads them to an unlikely door.

episodes.name: Teenage Vampires and a White Russian
episodes.overview: Bonnie is upset when her brother, Ray is arrested and calls Adam instead of her to bail him out. Also, Christy gets fired from her job at the restaurant.

episodes.name: A Bear and a Bladder Infection
episodes.overview: When Christy's long-distance relationship begins to fizzle, she seeks the company of a former fling. Also, Bonnie tries to give up coffee.

episodes.name: Bert and Ernie and a Blessing of the People
episodes.overview: After Bonnie and Adam attend a traditional wedding, they discover they're not on the same page about their own wedding. Also, Christy and Patrick have trouble setting the mood for their "first time".

episodes.name: Push-Down Coffee and a Working Turn Signal
episodes.overview: When Christy's car dies, Bonnie refuses to let Adam loan her money for a new one.

episodes.name: Pudding and a Screen Door
episodes.overview: Jill returns from her wellness retreat a changed woman, but Bonnie is offended when she refuses to pay for lunch. Also, Christy's plans for the future are thrown off track following disappointing news.

episodes.name: Charlotte Bront√´ and a Backhoe
episodes.overview: Bonnie locks horns with Jill's "inner strength" coach, Miranda. Also, Christy struggles to bounce back after being rejected from law school.

episodes.name: Esta Loca and a Little Klingon
episodes.overview: Christy and Bonnie help Jill get sober again, and Christy's boyfriend, Patrick, is less than understanding when it ruins his birthday weekend.

episodes.name: Eight Cats and the Hat Show
episodes.overview: Christy is blindsided by a surprising offer from her boyfriend, Patrick. Also, Bonnie struggles to be the stable one in her relationship after Adam experiences a devastating loss.

episodes.name: Crazy Snakes and a Clog to the Head
episodes.overview: When the ladies bring a meeting to a women‚Äôs prison, Bonnie is attacked by an old acquaintance, Tammy, and Christy helps Bonnie make amends.

episodes.name: Spaghetti Sauce and a Dumpster Fire
episodes.overview: Christy considers getting a new sponsor, Nora, after witnessing Marjorie have a major meltdown in a grocery store, and Bonnie tries her hand at being a supportive friend.

episodes.name: A Taco Bowl and a Tubby Seamstress
episodes.overview: Christy is concerned that she and Bonnie might lose their apartment when Bonnie locks horns with the tough new building owner, Rita.

episodes.name: Ocular Fluid and Fighting Robots
episodes.overview: Christy's sponsor challenges her to be nice to Bonnie at all costs, and Bonnie is convinced that Adam has stopped making an effort.

episodes.name: Phone Confetti and a Wee Dingle
episodes.overview: Christy and Bonnie's relaxing trip to a spa takes a turn when Bonnie lands in jail.

episodes.name: Diamond Earrings and a Pumpkin Head
episodes.overview: When Christy falls back into old habits, Bonnie worries about her well-being.

episodes.name: Pre-Washed Lettuce and a Mime
episodes.overview: Christy has second thoughts about law school after a tough first day, and Bonnie is plagued by an upsetting dream.

episodes.name: Go-Go Boots and a Butt Cushion
episodes.overview: When Christy decides she doesn‚Äôt need Gambler‚Äôs Anonymous anymore, Bonnie vehemently disagrees.

episodes.name: Ambulance Chasers and a Babbling Brook
episodes.overview: Christy‚Äôs demanding law professor leans on her a little too hard for support, and Bonnie‚Äôs plan to trick Adam into choosing a wedding venue backfires.

episodes.name: Big Sauce and Coconut Water
episodes.overview: Christy is certain that Bonnie is in over her head when she invites a freshly paroled Tammy to stay with them.

episodes.name: Flying Monkeys and a Tank of Nitrous
episodes.overview: When Marjorie's husband passes away, the ladies accompany her on a trip to memorialize him.

episodes.name: Cottage Cheese and a Weird Buzz
episodes.overview: Christy and Jill clash over a gambling debt; Bonnie's new hobby troubles Adam.

episodes.name: Puzzle Club and a Closet Party
episodes.overview: Christy and Wendy help Jill clean out her closet, which turns out to be a bigger job than expected; Bonnie, Marjorie and Tammy take up a new hobby.

episodes.name: Jell-O Shots and the Truth About Santa
episodes.overview: Bonnie pushes Christy to mend her relationship with Violet; Adam prepares for the grand opening of his bar.

episodes.name: Pork Loin and a Beat-up Monte Carlo
episodes.overview: Christy competes with her classmates for a prestigious internship, and Bonnie babysits Tammy following her oral surgery.

episodes.name: Flamingos and a Dance-Based Exercise Class
episodes.overview: Bonnie and the ladies help Tammy prepare for her first date since getting out of prison. Also, in order to take the edge off, Christy revisits one of her old vices.

episodes.name: Foot Powder and the Barrelworks Pirates
episodes.overview: Christy's search for the perfect Secret Santa gift leads her to discover Adam has been hiding something from Bonnie. Also, Tammy looks for a job in order to avoid being sent back to prison.

episodes.name: Hacky Sack and a Beautiful Experience
episodes.overview: Christy's smoking causes problems when the ladies take a road trip. Also, Bonnie offers Adam unsolicited business advice.

episodes.name: Big Floor Pillows and a Ball of Fire
episodes.overview: Christy and Bonnie are suspicious when Adam's best friend returns, insisting he's a changed man.

episodes.name: Kalamazoo and a Bad Wedge of Brie
episodes.overview: Christy's plan to win her sponsor's approval backfires, and the ladies rush in to help after Jill's house is broken into.

episodes.name: Sparkling Banter and a Failing Steel Town
episodes.overview: Christy is the only one without plans on Valentine's Day, so Bonnie takes her on a mother-daughter date. Also, Marjorie's attempt to have a quiet night in is ruined when everyone calls on her for help.

episodes.name: Skippy and the Knowledge Hole
episodes.overview: Christy finds it challenging to quit smoking, while Bonnie helps Tammy prepare for the GED test.

episodes.name: A Dark Closet and Therapy with Horses
episodes.overview: Bonnie reluctantly consults a therapist for help with her attention deficit disorder; Christy battles her urge to gamble on sports while helping out at the bar.

episodes.name: Soup Town and a Little Blonde Mongoose
episodes.overview: When Christy gets sick, Bonnie is consumed with an overwhelming urge to mother her.

episodes.name: Lumbar Support and Old Pork
episodes.overview: Bonnie has an unexpected reaction when she learns that Adam's bar is doing well. Also, Christy and Tammy go on a double date.

episodes.name: Triple Dip and an Overhand Grip
episodes.overview: Bonnie and Tammy revisit childhood memories on a trip to their old foster home. Also, Christy and Jill regret accepting a date with two guys from their AA meeting.

episodes.name: Fingers Guns and a Beef Bourguignon
episodes.overview: Christy discovers her new job at a law firm isn't quite what she expected; Bonnie's therapist pushes her to confront her problem with procrastination.

episodes.name: Crazy Hair and a Teeny Tiny Part of Canada
episodes.overview: Christy has trouble enjoying her sober birthday when she learns her sponsor, Nora, is moving away. Also, an argument leads Bonnie and Adam to make a hasty decision.

episodes.name: Audrey Hepburn and a Jalape√±o Pepper
episodes.overview: In the Season 7 premiere, Bonnie struggles to enjoy her perfect honeymoon with Adam; and Christy makes some questionable changes at the bar.

episodes.name: Pop Pop and a Puma
episodes.overview: Christy and Adam clash over an incident at the bar, leaving Bonnie in a precarious situation. Also, Jill's new boyfriend, Andy, has trouble finding a way to impress her.

episodes.name: Goat Yogurt and Ample Parking
episodes.overview: Christy is asked to perform questionable tasks for her demanding new boss, Veronica, and Bonnie has second thoughts about taking Adam's last name.

episodes.name: Twirly Flippy Men and a Dirty Bird
episodes.overview: Christy escorts a reluctant Chef Rudy to court-ordered AA meetings. Also, Bonnie attempts to make Adam feel more at home in the apartment.

episodes.name: Fake Bacon and a Plan to Kill All of Us
episodes.overview: Following the sudden death of a friend, Christy and Bonnie look for ways to honor her memory.

episodes.name: Wile E. Coyote and a Pretentious Douche
episodes.overview: Christy tries to embrace positivity after having a meltdown; Bonnie gets a glimpse of what Adam was like before his accident.

episodes.name: Pork Butt and a Mall Walker
episodes.overview: Bonnie and Adam go on a double date with Jill and Andy. Also, Tammy recruits Christy to mediate a sensitive situation with Marjorie.

episodes.name: Hot Butter and Toxic Narcissism
episodes.overview: Christy regrets fleeing the scene after hitting a parked car; Bonnie's therapist offers tools to help her better communicate with Adam.

episodes.name: Tuna Florentine and a Clean Handoff
episodes.overview: Christy and the ladies rally around Tammy when she has trouble adjusting to early release from parole. Also, Bonnie is disappointed when her perfect birthday gift for Adam gets a lukewarm response.

episodes.name: Higgledy-Piggledy and a Cat Show
episodes.overview: Bonnie is forced to relive painful Christmas memories when Christy recounts tales from her childhood to Bonnie's sponsee, Patty.

episodes.name: One Tiny Incision and a Coffin Dress
episodes.overview: Christy and Bonnie help Tammy with a difficult decision when her long-lost Aunt Cookie appears with a surprising proposition.

episodes.name: Silly Frills and a Depressed Garden Gnome
episodes.overview: Christy and Bonnie support Marjorie when she attempts to reconnect with her estranged son. Also, Tammy sees another side of Jill while working as her employee.

episodes.name: Dammit Sandra and Viking Ancestors
episodes.overview: Christy is troubled when sparks fly between Tammy and Chef Rudy. Also, Bonnie overreacts when her therapist, Trevor, accuses her of rejecting his help.

episodes.name: Cheddar Cheese and a Squirrel Circus
episodes.overview: After a successful kidney transplant surgery, Bonnie is concerned that Tammy's Aunt Cookie is taking her second chance for granted. Also, Christy tries to track down a handsome stranger she believes is her soulmate.

episodes.name: Somebody's Grandmother and the A-List
episodes.overview: Christy helps Marjorie prepare for her first date since her husband's passing. Also, Bonnie's friendship with Jill is put to the test when a past indiscretion resurfaces.

episodes.name: Judy Garland and a Sexy Troll Doll
episodes.overview: Bonnie helps Christy gain perspective as she considers a life-changing decision; and as Jill fears she's running out of time to have a baby, she consults a fertility doctor.

episodes.name: Beef Baloney Dan and a Sarcastic No
episodes.overview: Bonnie suspects that Adam's sponsor has an ulterior motive. And Christy is caught in the middle when Tammy plays hard to get with Chef Rudy.

episodes.name: A Judgy Face and Your Grandma's Drawers
episodes.overview: Christy, Bonnie and the ladies step in to help when Marjorie babysits her granddaughter for the first time.

episodes.name: Texas Pete and a Parking Lot Carnival
episodes.overview: Bonnie worries about her therapist when his life hits a serious rough patch; Christy comes to Marjorie's aid when she has trouble adjusting to a new job.

episodes.name: Big Sad Eyes and a Antique Hot Dog
episodes.overview: The ladies‚Äô friendships are tested when they live in close quarters during a sober retreat.

episodes.name: Sex Bucket and the Grammar Police
episodes.overview: When Bonnie invites the ladies to a slumber party, childhood games reveal adult problems.

episodes.name: Smitten Kitten and a Tiny Boo-Boo Error
episodes.overview: Bonnie and Adam regret spending their first wedding anniversary with Marjorie and her new beau; Jill's attempt at a good deed becomes a moral dilemma.

episodes.name: Tang and a Safe Space for Everybody
episodes.overview: Bonnie takes a trip down memory lane when she reconnects with an old flame, Rod. Also, Tammy volunteers to remodel the kitchen so it‚Äôs more accessible to Adam.

episodes.name: Astronauts and Fat Trimmings
episodes.overview: Bonnie and Adam offer relationship advice when they sense tension between Jill and Andy. Also, Tammy lends a hand when Chef Rudy opens a food truck.

episodes.name: Sober Wizard and a Woodshop Workshop
episodes.overview: Bonnie is concerned about Adam's safety when he decides to go skiing for the first time since his accident. Also, Tammy worries that Jill is sending the wrong message to the young girls they're mentoring.

episodes.name: Woo-Woo Lights and an Onside Kick
episodes.overview: Bonnie and the ladies indulge Jill when she goes to extremes to get her relationship with Andy back on track.

episodes.name: S‚ÄôMores and a Sadness Cocoon
episodes.overview: Bonnie is upset when Adam makes a big ticket purchase without consulting her. Also, Jill has an unexpected reaction when her dentist retires.

episodes.name: Bloody Stumps and a Chemical Smell
episodes.overview: When Bonnie can't decide what to do with the spare bedroom, bigger issues are uncovered. Also, Tammy attempts to create boundaries with Marjorie.

episodes.name: Whip-Its and Emotionally Attuned Babies
episodes.overview: Bonnie has success creating a line of mocktails for Adam's bar. Also, Jill finds herself attracted to Bonnie's therapist, Trevor.

episodes.name: Illegal Eels and the Cantaloupe Man
episodes.overview: Bonnie and Adam's romantic dinner is interrupted as the other ladies struggle with love on Valentine's Day. Also, Wendy's new relationship becomes the talk of the group.

episodes.name: Strutting Peacock and Father O'Leary
episodes.overview: Bonnie takes it personally when her new sponsee, Rod, gets inspiration from Adam instead of her.

episodes.name: Tiny Dancer and an Impromptu Picnic
episodes.overview: Bonnie goes to extreme lengths to protect someone she loves. Also, Jill struggles to make sense of a messy new relationship.

episodes.name: Klondike-Five and a Secret Family
episodes.overview: Bonnie worries about Adam when his amends to a woman from his past doesn‚Äôt go as planned. Also, Tammy pays a visit to the steakhouse she once robbed.

episodes.name: Endorphins and a Toasty Tushy
episodes.overview: Bonnie struggles with her own self-worth after Tammy finds success. Also, Jill‚Äôs new hobby leads to an unexpected revelation.

episodes.name: Vinyl Flooring and a Cartoon Bear
episodes.overview: Bonnie and Tammy‚Äôs friendship is tested when they take on a big project together. Also, the women worry about a fracture in their tight-knit group.

episodes.name: Scooby-Doo Checks and Salisbury Steak
episodes.overview: Bonnie decides to get to the bottom of why her therapist, Trevor, has been so distracted. Also, Jill and Andy find themselves in a life or death situation.

episodes.name: A Community Hero and a Wide Turn
episodes.overview: The women attend a gala honoring Marjorie, but Bonnie's speech doesn't go as planned.

episodes.name: My Kinda People and the Big To-Do
episodes.overview: Bonnie gains a new outlook on her sobriety after dealing with difficult news. Also, Jill and Andy take a big step in their relationship.
